lead_paragraph: Pele will not attend Friday's opening ceremony of the Rio Olympics because of poor health, denying Brazilians a chance to celebrate their greatest sports figure.

headline.print_headline: Pele Says Poor Health Will Keep Him From Opening Ceremony
headline.main: Pele Says Poor Health Will Keep Him From Opening Ceremony

snippet: Pele will not attend Friday's opening ceremony of the Rio Olympics because of poor health, denying Brazilians a chance to celebrate their greatest sports figure....
